name: Blow Me Away
description:
I didn't have time to finish it, but it's playable! Note that there is no sound (this is a feature, not a bug :p).

Controls:

Arrow keys or WAD to move.

Hold Ctrl (or down arrow, or S, or left mouse click) to blow in the direction you're facing. (Note that the mouse cursor is not used).

Press F11 to toggle fullscreen.

Goal:

Blow all of the leaves into the compost bins!
